item.title: About me
item.author: tokanyi@gmail.com (Stephen Kanyi)
item.description: My name is Stephen Kanyi. I have the following qualities: I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just read on what i do here.
